definitions.text: the act of determining the properties of something, usually by research or calculation
the quality of being determined to do or achieve something; firmness of purpose
examples: his determination showed in his every movement
he is a man of purpose

definitions.text: a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
examples: a decision unfavorable to the opposition
his conclusion took the evidence into account

definitions.text: deciding or controlling something's outcome or nature
the act of making up your mind about something
examples: the burden of decision was his
